Name: Peasant Knight
About the game: Peasant Knight is a challenging puzzle-platformer that you can play with only two keys: jump and stop. All the while you're relentlessly dashing forward into traps, enemies, and hazards. Peasant Knight has a tongue-in-cheek tone that fits well the many ways to reach your demise. Features: * 80+ levels to solve * 18 traps, enemies, and bosses to overcome. * Local multiplayer (up to 4 players) * Coop and race modes
